How It Works

Simple, powerful, and intelligent

01

Upload Your Personal Documents or Paste Text

Add PDFs, guidelines, manuals, or any text-based documents to your knowledge base.

02

AI Processing

Our system chunks, embeds, and indexes your documents for optimal retrieval.

03

Ask Questions

Chat naturally with the AI assistant to get accurate, cited answers from your documents.

Why Focused Context Matters

The Problem with General AI Assistants

The Internet Pollution Problem

Traditional AI assistants pull from the entire internet, mixing your specific documents with countless unrelated sources. This creates noise, confusion, and inaccurate answers that don't reflect your organization's actual knowledge base.

Document-Focused Intelligence

Our system creates a controlled environment where the AI assistant operates exclusively within the context of your uploaded documents. For training purposes, corporate knowledge bases, or specialized information, you get answers that are 100% grounded in your content—nothing more, nothing less.

Key Benefits of Focused Context

Protected Documents

Your sensitive corporate information stays within your controlled environment, never exposed to public internet sources.

Training-Focused

Perfect for employee training programs where you need answers based solely on your training materials, not external sources.

Corporate-Specific

Ensure your team gets answers based on your company's policies, procedures, and knowledge base—not generic internet advice.

Custom Branding

Brand your document assistant with your organization's identity, creating a seamless experience for your team or clients.

Secure Sharing

Share your document assistant with confidence, knowing recipients only see answers from your approved documents.

Access Control

Granular permissions ensure only authorized users can access specific documents and knowledge bases.

Built for Knowledge Workers

Our AI Document Assistant leverages state-of-the-art AI technology to provide accurate, contextual answers from your document library. Whether you're working with medical guidelines, research papers, training manuals, or any knowledge base, our system delivers instant, reliable insights.
